code: import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import ButtonGitHub from'../components/buttonGitHub/ButtonGitHub';import{projects}from'../helpers/projectList';import img from'./../img/projects/01-big.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const project=projects[id];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title-1",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.imgBig,alt:"",className:"project-details__cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-details__desc",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.skills})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ButtonGitHub,{link:project.gitHubLink})]})})});};export default ProjectDetail;
